name: Spinach and Pasta Shells
author: YAKUTA
summary: This is a very easy recipe and for those people who like garlic and a little bit of spice in their pasta it's perfect. Add more or less red pepper flakes depending on your fondness for spicy food. This goes great with a salad and some garlic bread, if desired.
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and spinach and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until pasta is al dente; drain and reserve
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add garlic and red pepper flakes; saute for 5 minutes or until the garlic turns light gold
Add cooked pasta and spinach to the skillet and mix well
Season with salt and toss; serve
